org.cornutum.tcases.io

Class XmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.io.IndentedWriter
      • org.cornutum.tcases.io.XmlWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class XmlWriter
extends IndentedWriter
    Supports creation of an XML document stream.
